name: 8X8 Amphibious Truck
description:
8X8 Amphibious Truck is an extreme offroad game with awesome 3D graphics where you can choose to ride a 8X8 Amphibious Truck. Experience “out of this world” off-road driving as you’ve never lived it before. In 8X8 Amphibious Truck, you have to discover your way around a very large Terrain and drive your 8X8 Amphibious Truck to the destination.
Are you ready for the challenge?
